articles.description: Motor sports have used online racing to give fans something to watch during the COVID-19 pandemic. But now drivers are backing away from social media interaction after a prank went badly wrong for a German racer.
articles.content:
German driver Daniel Abt parted company with the Audi Formula E team on Tuesday after letting a professional gamer impersonate him in an official esports race.
